title: Drawing, "Lady Esther Yacht: Stateroom", 1934–35
description: Living room (?) of Lady Esther Yacht. Low cabinet/shelving unit along wall at left; partial view of window with horizontal blinds above. One drawer above two-door cabinet on right. Five-seat, box-frame sofa against left wall; upholstered seat and back. Two windows with horizontal blinds above sofa; window to right is larger than the left. Built-in cabinet/shelving unit extends on right wall; all furniture at same level. Cut-out square shelf at immediate right of sofa. Two long, horiztonal shelves along right wall. At right side of unit, pole connects shelves to top and base of unit. Partial view of doorway on far right. Low, upholstered lounge chair in foreground at right, facing sofa. Faint drawing of long rectangular coffee table in lower right corner.

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "Lady Esther Yacht: Stateroom", 1934–35.
1934–35. Graphite on tracing paper. Gift of Donald Deskey. 1975-11-313.
